SEARCH
Package AcademicExchangePlatform.dao

Interface CourseApplicationDAO

All Known Implementing Classes:
CourseApplicationDAOImpl
public interface CourseApplicationDAO
Data Access Object interface for managing course applications in the Academic Exchange Platform. Provides methods to create, update, retrieve, and manage course applications.

  • Method Details

    • createApplication

      boolean createApplication(CourseApplication application)
      Creates a new course application in the database.
      Parameters:
      application - The CourseApplication object containing application details
      Returns:
      true if creation was successful, false otherwise

    • updateApplicationStatus

      boolean updateApplicationStatus(int applicationId, ApplicationStatus status, int institutionId)
      Updates the status of an existing course application.
      Parameters:
      applicationId - The ID of the application to update
      status - The new ApplicationStatus to set
      institutionId - The ID of the institution making the update
      Returns:
      true if update was successful, false otherwise

    • getApplicationById

      CourseApplication getApplicationById(int applicationId)
      Retrieves a specific course application by its ID.
      Parameters:
      applicationId - The ID of the application to retrieve
      Returns:
      The CourseApplication object if found, null otherwise

    • getApplicationsByCourse

      List<CourseApplication> getApplicationsByCourse(int courseId)
      Retrieves all applications for a specific course.
      Parameters:
      courseId - The ID of the course
      Returns:
      List of CourseApplication objects

    • getApplicationsByProfessional

      List<CourseApplication> getApplicationsByProfessional(int professionalId)
      Retrieves all applications submitted by a specific professional.
      Parameters:
      professionalId - The ID of the academic professional
      Returns:
      List of CourseApplication objects

    • withdrawApplication

      boolean withdrawApplication(int applicationId)
      Withdraws a course application.
      Parameters:
      applicationId - The ID of the application to withdraw
      Returns:
      true if withdrawal was successful, false otherwise

    • getAllInstitutionApplications

      List<CourseApplication> getAllInstitutionApplications(int institutionId)
      Retrieves all applications for courses at a specific institution.
      Parameters:
      institutionId - The ID of the academic institution
      Returns:
      List of CourseApplication objects

    • hasExistingApplication

      boolean hasExistingApplication(int professionalId, int courseId)
      Checks if a professional has an existing application for a course.
      Parameters:
      professionalId - The ID of the academic professional
      courseId - The ID of the course
      Returns:
      true if an application exists, false otherwise

    • getApplicationCount

      int getApplicationCount(int courseId)
      Gets the total number of applications for a specific course.
      Parameters:
      courseId - The ID of the course
      Returns:
      The number of applications

      boolean updateApplication(CourseApplication application)
      Updates an existing course application.
      Parameters:
      application - The CourseApplication object containing updated details
      Returns:
      true if update was successful, false otherwise
